experienceData.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Responsible for the development of a high-availability online case management system, enhancing digital court operations across Victoria for improved efficiency and public accessibility.
Designed user-centric, responsive React interfaces, significantly enhancing user experience for court staff and the public.
Architected and implemented backend solutions using Java and Groovy with PostgreSQL for data storage, ensuring scalable, secure data processing for comprehensive legal case management.
Involved in cross-functional collaboration to align system development with the nuanced requirements of the legal domain, ensuring comprehensive feature integration and user satisfaction.

experienceData.title: Full Stack Web Development Instructor
responsibilities: As an instructor at the University of Adelaide's bootcamp, I played a crucial role in shaping future web developers through immersive coding exercises and projects.
Delivered engaging lectures on a broad array of technologies, with a heavy focus on the MERN stack, particularly ReactJS and NodeJS.

experienceData.title: Software Engineer (Full Stack)
responsibilities: Started as a Software Developer at VisualR and, due to my hard work and passion, was promoted to Senior Software Engineer within just two years.
Led full-stack development at VisualR, implementing web applications using technologies like ReactJS, NodeJS, TypeScript, NextJS, Apollo, GraphQL, MySQL, and MongoDB.
Managed API development with REST and GraphQL, and integrated database solutions with MySQL and MongoDB to enhance back-end functionality.
Oversaw application deployments across development, staging, and production environments, utilizing Git for version control and team collaboration.

experienceData.title: Founder & Developer
responsibilities: Founded and developed pkdreamers, an innovative platform connecting travelers with tour agencies in Pakistan, using the MERN stack.
Engineered comprehensive front-end and back-end solutions, including user interfaces in React and Next.js, and API development with GraphQL, Node.js and Express.
